snippet: The executive director of the New York State Thruway Authority said that rates would not increase in 2016, but that the new group would issue toll recommendations for the replacement.
abstract: New York State Thruway Authority announces creation of task force to examine whether to raise tolls on bridge being built to replace Tappan Zee; experts have long predicted  construction of $3.9 billion replacement bridge would force state to raise tolls, but by how much is unclear.
lead_paragraph: The executive director of the New York State Thruway Authority said that rates would not increase in 2016, but that the new group would issue toll recommendations for the replacement.

headline.main: Panel to Examine Tolls for New Tappan Zee Bridge
headline.print_headline: Study Set on Tolls for New Tappan Zee Bridge
